summary: Crash in [@ AsyncShutdownTimeout | quit-application-granted | DAPTelemetrySender: sending data]

socorro_links.comment_text:
29 crash reports from 23 installations of Firefox 122.0a1 starting with build ID 20231122215037.

[Pushlog of the first affected build](https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/pushloghtml?changeset=b9fe9a49496aa38ca77c335f20236610ef01a582).

Simon, could you try to identify what causes this shutdown crash which mentions `DAPTelemetrySender.sys.mjs`?

Crash report: https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/cf44ec2f-d0c4-4ea8-b47b-e374d0231123

MOZ_CRASH Reason: ```[Parent 14012, Main Thread] ###!!! ABORT: file resource://gre/modules/DAPTelemetrySender.sys.mjs:88```

Top 10 frames of crashing thread:
```
0  xul.dll  MOZ_Crash  mfbt/Assertions.h:281
0  xul.dll  Abort  xpcom/base/nsDebugImpl.cpp:513
0  xul.dll  NS_DebugBreak  xpcom/base/nsDebugImpl.cpp:496
1  xul.dll  nsDebugImpl::Abort  xpcom/base/nsDebugImpl.cpp:129
2  xul.dll  XPTC__InvokebyIndex  
3  xul.dll  NS_InvokeByIndex  xpcom/reflect/xptcall/md/win32/xptcinvoke_x86_64.cpp:57
3  xul.dll  CallMethodHelper::Invoke  js/xpconnect/src/XPCWrappedNative.cpp:1627
3  xul.dll  CallMethodHelper::Call  js/xpconnect/src/XPCWrappedNative.cpp:1180
3  xul.dll  XPCWrappedNative::CallMethod  js/xpconnect/src/XPCWrappedNative.cpp:1126
4  xul.dll  XPC_WN_CallMethod  js/xpconnect/src/XPCWrappedNativeJSOps.cpp:966
```
